aow.info.name: Honor Hunting - Basics
aow.info.description: Tips on Honor Hunting formation for new players.

embed.title: Honor Hunting - Basics
embed.description:
• Use as many Voodoo Dolls as you can. In general, 2 level-7 > 1 level-8, and 2 level-8 > 1 level-9. (Note: Voodoo Dolls are unlocked at level 5000.)
• Keep a record of your damages ([template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aOZSyGjXMXAROVeVlt36GNVFUOcOZKZdx-FiiIKBvBU/edit?usp=sharing)). Try to improve your scores each round.
• Ask your clan mates for help with your formation.
• __Pause and back out__ of an attack if you aren't getting the result you wanted.
